name: Amazing Princess Gymnastics Horizontal Bar
description:
*** Best Sporty and Gymnastic Game in the store! ***

New Christmas gymnastics outfits are available now !

Hang on tight as the newest and the best Gymnastics game is here!

Prepare you horizontal bar routine and be ready with your grip as you participate in the world’s most popular gymnastics event. Compete with kids, girls and boys around the world and show off your Horizontal bar skills
Spin and jump high as you grip from one bar to another, collect hearts and power ups along the way. Perform your best routine and win the championship.

Be who you want to be by customizing your own character. Dress up your very own gymnast: choose her hair, dress, skirt, shoes and more!
Play and have fun together with your friends. Compare your scores and show off your unique gymnast.

You will be hooked and addicted with Amazing Princess Horizontal Bar which also features:
- Very easy one-touch gameplay, just tap, aim at the bars and jump
- Never ending excitement with endless levels
- Kids, Girls and boys will surely love the design and the arrangement of the obstacles
- Amazing sounds and graphics
- Free to download and play
